other_tests.findings: Infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm with extensive soft tissue surrounding the aorta and inflammation extending into the peri-aortic fat.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CT scan repeated about 2 months after the initiation of prednisone showed a marked decrease in the retroperitoneal inflammation.

other_tests.findings: Fusiform dilatation of the infrarenal abdominal aorta measuring up to 3.1 cm, with thickening of the anterior wall of the aorta up to 8 mm.
